resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107485</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107485</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212961</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Using a Secchi Disk or Transparency Tube</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwenden eines Secchi Platte-oder 
Transparent-Gefäßes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisation d'un tube de disque ou de transparent 
de Secchi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando um tubo do disco ou da transparência de 
Secchi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per mezzo di un tubo del disco o dell'acetato di 
Secchi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποίηση ενός δίσκου Secchi ή ενός σωλήνα 
διαφάνειας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usar un tubo del disco o de la transparencia de 
Secchi</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This EPA website provides instructions for using Secchi disks and transparency tubes to measure water clarity. The page also features a short description of each device.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese EPA Web site stellt Anwendungsvorschriften 
Secchi Platten zur Verfügung und Transparentgefäße zum Maß 
wässern Klarheit. Die Seite kennzeichnet auch eine kurze 
Beschreibung jeder Einheit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site Web d'EPA fournit des instructions pour 
des disques d'utilisation Secchi et les tubes de transparent à la 
mesure arrosent la clarté. La page comporte également une 
description courte de chaque dispositif.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este Web site de EPA fornece instruções para 
discos usando-se de Secchi e os tubos da transparência à medida 
molham a claridade. A página caracteriza também uma 
descrição curta de cada dispositivo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo Web site di EPA fornisce le istruzioni per 
i dischi usando Secchi ed i tubi dell'acetato alla misura innaffiano 
la chiarezza. La pagina egualmente caratterizza una descrizione 
corta di ogni dispositivo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο ιστοχώρος EPA παρέχει τις οδηγίες για τη 
χρησιμοποίηση των δίσκων Secchi και των σωλήνων διαφάνειας για 
να μετρήσει τη σαφήνεια ύδατος. Η σελίδα χαρακτηρίζει 
επίσης μια σύντομη περιγραφή κάθε συσκευής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este Web site de EPA proporciona a las 
instrucciones para los discos de Secchi que usan y los tubos de la 
transparencia a la medida riegan claridad. La paginación 
también ofrece una descripción corta de cada dispositivo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AGENCY
FN:ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AGENCY
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212961</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107485</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/using-a-secchi-disk-or-transparency-tube</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
